verses.roman:
ei-mata yabe karena uttama randhana
more khāoyāite kare utkaṇṭhāya rodana

synonyms: ei-mata—in this way; yabe—when; karena—does; uttama randhana—first-class cooking; more—Me; khāoyāite—to feed; kare—does; utkaṇṭhāya—with great anxiety; rodana—crying.
translation: "Now whenever she prepares some good cooked food and wants to feed it to Me, she cries in great anxiety.
